description: a(1) = 1; a(n+1) = LCM(sum{k=1 to n}[a(k)], product{k=1 to n}[a(k)]).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..13
prog: (Haskell)a058345 n = a058345_list !! (n-1)a058345_list = 1 : f 1 1 where   f u v = w : f (u * w) (v + w) where w = lcm u v-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 20 2014
author: _Leroy Quet_, Dec 14 2000
